isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Crankcase, Crankshaft, Connecting Rods, And Pistons - Connecting Rods, Pistons and Piston Rings - Connecting Rods

caution.para: On newer engines using the fractured connecting rods keep mating surfaces clean and free of debris.

item.para: DO NOT allow mating surfaces to rest on any other surface.
DO NOT bump the mating surfaces or drop the connecting rod or cap.

caution.para: This could cause wear and chipping of the fractured surface, resulting in improper mating during installation and possible engine damage.

If the connecting rod cap is reversed when assembled to the connecting rod or a connecting rod cap is not installed in its original matching connecting rod, the fractured mating surfaces will be useless. The entire connecting rod assembly must be replaced.

step1.para: Inspect connecting rod bolts for nicks or damage. Replace as required.
Inspect connecting rod and cap mating surfaces and bearing bore for any indication of damage. Bore must be smooth and free of scoring or nicks. Replace as required.
